movements.name: Body (Quarterhouse)
movements.description: Taking waltz hold, couples dance 2 steps in place then house 2 steps on to the next place on their R. They repeat this 4 step movement into each place and back home.

movements.name: Ladies Chain
movements.description: R hands in the centre, L elbow hook to turn the opposite gent 2 turns (8 bars), R hands on the way back to their partners and take waltz hold (2 bars).
Side couples ladies chain and swing.
